text.section: This Part II of this subtitle applies only to tax supported debt.

This Part II of this subtitle does not affect:
the authority of the Governor to submit:
amendments to the consolidated loan budget or to any accompanying bill; or
instead of amendments, separate bills that authorize State debt; or
the authority of the General Assembly to:
continue its independent analysis of State debt affordability; or
consider bills that authorize State debt in addition to the bills that accompany the consolidated loan budget.
